
SET(GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION "33" CACHE STRING "OPENGL_VERSION: either 30,33,40 or 45")
message("-- GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION:	${GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION}")

set(GLAD_SOURCE_FILES 
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION}/glad.c
)
set(GLAD_HEADER_FILES
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION}/glad.h
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION}/khrplatform.h
)

add_library(glad ${GLAD_SOURCE_FILES} ${GLAD_HEADER_FILES})#${GLAD_HEADER_FILES}
target_include_directories(glad PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${GLAD_OPENGL_CORE_VERSION})
# target_compile_definitions(glad PUBLIC GLAD_GLAPI_EXPORT PRIVATE GLAD_GLAPI_EXPORT_BUILD)

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${GLAD_SOURCE_FILES} ${GLAD_HEADER_FILES})
